Articles.Content:
Hi there, friends!
First things first: I'm very bad in English, so I'll try to speak easy. This is for make you understand me as easy as it possible.

 

After installing some mods (all of them are for 1.3.* up to date) game showing loading screen, loading, loading... And when loading finished, game just crashing. Here is a link for a crash log: LINK

 

I tried to remove some mods (but all of them are MUST HAVE for me), but still cant find out what exactly mod causes game to crash. =(

 

 

KSP 1.3.1

Steam

Windows 10

Mods installed:

(and BD Armory Continued).

 

-----------------------

 

And second question: any solution to find a crash reason by the log file? KSP havent any Discord or Telegram  channels, but forums are hard enough for me. =(

 

My nervous system reaching it's limit...

Edited December 18, 2017 by renesi
Don't use the 32bit executable if you want to run a lot of mods.
I never using 32 bit. I starting only KSP 64. I even bought 32GB's of RAM. EXACTLY for KSP.

29 minutes ago, renesi said:

I never using 32 bit. I starting only KSP 64. I even bought 32GB's of RAM. EXACTLY for KSP.

Your error.log says you are running "E:\SteamGames\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe", which is the 32bit version.

I have a lot of mods, and my game crashes when I launch 32 bit version as well. When I switch to 64 bit, the problem ceases.

 

Try 64 bit, it should work for you.

35 minutes ago, Harry Rhodan said:

Your error.log says you are running "E:\SteamGames\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe", which is the 32bit version.

I suppose I'm gonna kill STEAM. with it self-deciding "what file to start".

 

Thank you. As I may suppose, problem is solved for now.

Thank you everyone who answered.
